code:
module TopModule (
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic c,
    input logic d,
    output logic out
);

    always @(*) begin
        out = (a & ~b & ~c & ~d) | (a & ~b & d) | (a & c & ~d) | 
              (b & ~c & d) | (b & c) | (c & d);
    end

endmodule
